Question: This person "survived" his containment to help O'Brien present the Emmy Award for Best Comedy Series (which went to The Office).
Hints: In 2011, this person made a cameo in the film Horrible Bosses.
This person finally pulled the plug on his own sitcom in 1978 after six seasons and 142 episodes.
